Reference

S4 classes

bcbioRNASeq()

bcbio RNA-Seq data set

coerce

Methods for coercing an object to a class

`[`(<bcbioRNASeq>,<ANY>,<ANY>,<ANY>)

Extract or replace parts of an object

show(<bcbioRNASeq>)

Show an object

updateObject(<bcbioRNASeq>)

Update an object to its current class definition

Counts

Counts

relativeLogExpression()

Relative log expression

tmm()

Trimmed mean of M-values

Plots

plot5Prime3PrimeBias()

Plot 5' to 3' bias

Correlation heatmap

plotCounts()

Plot counts

plotCountsPerBiotype() plotCountsPerBroadClass()

Plot counts per biotype

plotCountsPerFeature()

Plot counts per feature

plotDispEsts()

Plot Dispersion Estimates

plotExonicMappingRate()

Plot exonic mapping rate

plotGenderMarkers()

Plot sexually dimorphic gender marker genes

plotGeneSaturation()

Plot gene detection saturation

plotIntronicMappingRate()

Plot intronic mapping rate

plotMappedReads()

Plot mapped reads

plotMappingRate()

Plot mapping rate

plotMeanSD()

Plot row standard deviations vs. row means

plotPCA()

Principal component analysis plot

plotPCACovariates()

Find correlation between principal components (PCs) and covariates

plotQC()

Quality control

plotRRNAMappingRate()

Plot ribosomal RNA (rRNA) mapping rate

plotTotalReads()

Plot total reads

plotFeaturesDetected() plotHeatmap() plotQuantileHeatmap()

S4 generics re-exported from other packages
